504220.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroes of High Fantasy: Creaking in the Dark (5E)
504220.description:
When an injured child collapses in the street, will you venture into the cellar he fled from to discover what hides, creaking in the dark?
This variable difficulty module is designed to act as a single session encounter or as a side quest to your existing campaign. The unique way its written and the various appendix sections present three difficulty levels to best suit your needs as a DM.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Danny Stratton
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
